So this chair looks good, feels good for its price. Fairly easy to assemble. I haven't had issues with sturdiness like some of the other reviews here, however I also don't use the chair that often largely because of the severe back pain it causes me after an 1 hour of sitting. I began having a lot of lower back pain and it took me while that it would go after switching chairs to my bar stool instead. As much I like the aesthetic of chair, this made the chair functionally useless for me. As far as I can see its no way to adjust the angle of the seat, which is what I think is causing the problem. It could also be the design naturally doesnt provide any lumbar support.
I really love these dining chairs. They were a breeze to assemble (just attach the legs which are in 2 parts) and I really like the spacious seat and armrests.

These chairs are just what I wanted! I was little disappointed that one of them arrived without hardware, so I had to improvise and use the extra bolts from other chairs and just run to hardware store to get 5 washers I needed. Also, 3 out of 8 chairs had and issue with threading for one of the screws and I was unable to fully screw one of them in. So, chair is little wobbly and if feels like one leg is longer than others. I unfortunately threw away all of the papers that came with the chairs, so I was unable to reach out to the manufacturer directly. But still a great buy for the price.

Have been looking for a desk chair that doesn't kill my back for years. Also am kinda short. . .  so my feet never touch the floor. No matter how "ergonomic" (expensive) they all tend to be crap. Thought I'd try this one . . . and wow! It's excellent. I work at a desk for 8-10 hours a day. This is super comfortable. Great lower back support. My feet touch the floor. 评论详情: Be careful when purchasing!! The chair arrived with massive adhesive inspection stickers in the bottom ON THE WOODEN FINISH. The adhesive they used on the stickers us different than regular labels and left hard to remove adhesives all over the wood. I had to spend close to an hour scraping it all off, and at the end left patchy spots all over the bottom of the chair.  You'd think for a premium product like this one they'd know not to stick horrible adhesive labels to the wooden finish of their products...

They use layers of laminated wood that are curved which while it’s a technique, the quality control means that some chair legs are great and others snap like toothpicks. 评论概述: Dangerous!!!! KNOWN Manufacturing Defect!!! Sit with caution.
评论详情: We ordered 8 chairs and 4 of them within a week (45 days after ordering them) the legs failed/broke (see images). We should have read the reviews - as early as 2021 complaints have been made about the chair's legs breaking. Called the manufacture to warn them of the issue and they didn't seem to care. Did offer to send new legs, but with half of our chairs breaking we wouldn't trust new legs. Luckily Amazon made an exception and allowed to return the chairs. Now we have to pack up 8 chairs to return them (not worth the purchase). I would avoid these chairs as if your life depended on it (no pun intended as our friend fell really hard when the leg suddenly broke).  Best of Luck to all who sit upon any Armen chairs that share the same legs.

Bought one to try it out and ended up buying the set of six. Everyone that visits is in love with them. Worried about how the arm rests will hold up with daily use. The one my husband uses did start creaking after a month. Super comfortable and nice chairs. Still TBD on how long they last.

I set up my home office a few months ago after I did not have to commute to the office any longer for my position. I purchased this chair and I never write reviews but I had to just say this chair has been amazing. It’s super comfortable, it was easy to assemble, it’s extremely sturdy and it actually gets compliments when I have visitors. For the money, you really can’t do much better. Highly recommend!
